about.title: About Paddy Marketing Board
about.subtitle: Empowering Sri Lankan Agriculture
about.description: Established in 1971, the Paddy Marketing Board of Sri Lanka has been the cornerstone of food security and agricultural development in our nation for over five decades.
about.mission_desc: To ensure food security through sustainable rice production, fair pricing mechanisms, and comprehensive support to farmers while maintaining the highest quality standards for consumers across Sri Lanka.
about.vision_desc: To be the leading agricultural institution in South Asia, pioneering sustainable farming practices, technological innovation, and ensuring prosperity for farming communities while feeding the nation.
